summary: TL* THE CONTACT OWNS A 2015 CHEVROLET SILVERADO 1500. WHILE IN TRAFFIC, THE BRAKE PEDAL FELT HARD WHEN DEPRESSED AND FAILED TO SLOW DOWN THE VEHICLE. THE CONTACT HAD TO DRIVE OFF THE FREEWAY AND ONTO THE GRAVEL TO BRING THE VEHICLE TO A COMPLETE STOP. THERE WERE NO WARNING INDICATORS ILLUMINATED. THE VEHICLE WAS TOWED TO THE CONTACT'S RESIDENCE AND LATER TOWED TO MARK CHRISTOPHER AUTO CENTER (2131 E CONVENTION CENTER WAY, ONTARIO, CA 91764, (909) 321-5860) WHERE IT WAS DIAGNOSED THAT THE BRAKE VACUUM PUMP FAILED AND NEEDED TO BE REPLACED. THE VEHICLE WAS REPAIRED. THE MANUFACTURER WAS NOT NOTIFIED OF THE FAILURE. THE APPROXIMATE FAILURE MILEAGE WAS 71,000.
